title: Phrases in Bed, MTH, Social Media, Sand and Soul and more.
itunes:title: Phrases in Bed, MTH, Social Media, Sand and Soul and more.
description:
Happy Memorial Day y'all!  Today we have an opening for you to remember.  We have another epic reenactment from Fool #2 and Uncle Steve when it comes to avoiding your wife or girlfriend after work.  What are the phrases you hear when you lack bedroom skills?  J. Anthony Brown murders another one in the spirit of Kirk Franklin.  A survey may have suggested that social media has replaced reunions.  Agree or nah?  The comedians are here with Comedy Roulette.  You know you are lost when........Today we get to ask Big Bog, "When was your first?"  We continue the discussion about Sand and Soul.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about graduation and more.  Have a great weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
